meanings: (질병) disease, illness, sickness, disorder; (가벼운) ailment; (국부적인) (formal) complaint, (heart/skin) trouble
give someone a disease and then medicine
There is no man of great strength for a disease

examples.korean: The wines are bottled after three years. 발음듣기 그 포도주는 3년 후에 병에 담는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The wines are bottled after three years. 발음

examples.korean: The disease has left her with permanent lameness. 발음듣기 그 병으로 그녀는 평생 다리를 절게 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The disease has left her with permanent lameness. 발음

examples.korean: If untreated, the illness can become severe. 발음듣기 만약 치료를 안 받으면 병이 심해질 수가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If untreated, the illness can become severe. 발음

examples.korean: He had a morbid fascination with blood. 발음듣기 그는 병적으로 피에 매혹을 느꼈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had a morbid fascination with blood. 발음

examples.korean: He sought solace in the whisky bottle. 발음듣기 그는 위스키 병[술병]에서 위안을 찾았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He sought solace in the whisky bottle. 발음
